subSections.title: Readings
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|じょう|hhira=ぢやう}}

# [[jō]], a [[traditional]] [[Japanese]] [[unit]] of [[length]] [[based]] on 10 [[shaku]], [[standardize]]d as [[equal]] to 3 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>33</sub> [[meter]]s.

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text: /take<small>2</small>/: [takye] → [take]. Cognate with {{m|ja|高|tr=taka||height}}, {{m|ja|高い|tr=takai||high}}, and {{m|ja|長ける|tr=takeru||to be high}}.

subSections.title: Noun
Particle
Usage notes
subSections.text: * The Kanji spelling '''丈''' is rarely used.
